name: port8080folio
description: Personal portfolio and XState education platform

scripts.build: pnpm clean && pnpm compile-scripts && pnpm type-check
scripts.lint: biome check *.ts src/ extensions/*/src/ extensions/*/package.json tests/ docs/ intake/ examples/
scripts.lint:errors-only: biome check *.ts src/ extensions/*/src/ extensions/*/package.json tests/ docs/ intake/ examples/ --diagnostic-level=error
scripts.lint:dev: biome check *.ts src/ tests/ docs/ intake/ examples/ --diagnostic-level=error
scripts.lint:fix: biome check --write *.ts src/ extensions/*/src/ extensions/*/package.json tests/ docs/ intake/ examples/
scripts.lint:fix:dev: biome check --write *.ts src/ tests/ docs/ intake/ examples/ --diagnostic-level=error
scripts.format: biome format --write *.ts src/ extensions/*/src/ extensions/*/package.json tests/ docs/ intake/ examples/
scripts.check: biome check *.ts src/ extensions/*/src/ extensions/*/package.json tests/ docs/ intake/ examples/
scripts.check:all: pnpm run check && pnpm run check:reactive && pnpm run check:reactive:lint
scripts.lint:reactive:json: find src/ -name '*.ts' -not -path '*/test/*' | xargs node extensions/reactive-lint/dist/cli.js --format json
scripts.lint:reactive:sarif: find src/ -name '*.ts' -not -path '*/test/*' | xargs reactive-lint --format sarif > reactive-lint-results.sarif
scripts.dev:ai: pnpm run lint:reactive && pnpm run ai:sync
scripts.ai:review: pnpm run lint:reactive:json | node ai-agent-client.mjs --task pre-commit-review
scripts.dev:metrics:safe: pnpm run lint:reactive:summary | grep -o "[0-9]+ violations" | grep -o "[0-9]+" || echo "0"

author: Jose Flores
